description.value: Your fangs are exceptionally painful. Whenever you score a critical hit with your fangs unarmed attack, you apply the unarmed attack's critical specialization effect.

rules.text: The target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.
rules.title: XPRPG.Actor.Creature.CriticalSpecialization
